entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 4 except minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4 except minus 8 inland. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 except minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 except minus 8 inland. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
